properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 8:48AM EST until January 18 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations
of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of
an inch.

* WHERE...Hardin County.

* WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 8 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will start as snow, then
change to a wintry mix of sleet, snow, and freezing rain late
tonight, eventually becoming all rain by early Saturday
morning.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iln as
well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM EST SATURDAY
